pokedexEntries.red: Under a full moon, this Pokémon likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.
pokedexEntries.blue: Under a full moon, this Pokémon likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.
pokedexEntries.yellow: A Gengar is close by if you feel a sudden chill. It may be trying to lay a curse on you.
pokedexEntries.gold: It steals heat from its surroundings. If you feel a sudden chill, it is certain that a Gengar appeared.
pokedexEntries.silver: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey's shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.
pokedexEntries.crystal: Hiding in people's shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.
pokedexEntries.ruby: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
pokedexEntries.sapphire: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
pokedexEntries.emerald: Deep in the night, your shadow cast by a streetlight may suddenly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
pokedexEntries.fireRed: It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.
pokedexEntries.leafGreen: On the night of the full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengar's doing.
pokedexEntries.diamond: It hides in shadows. It is said that if Gengar is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees F.
pokedexEntries.pearl: Lurking in the shadowy corners of rooms, it awaits chances to steal its prey's life force.
pokedexEntries.platinum: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a Gengar delighting in casting curses on people.
pokedexEntries.heartGold: It steals heat from its surroundings. If you feel a sudden chill, it is certain that a Gengar appeared.
pokedexEntries.soulSilver: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey's shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.
pokedexEntries.black: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a Gengar delighting in casting curses on people.
pokedexEntries.white: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a Gengar delighting in casting curses on people.
pokedexEntries.black2: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a Gengar delighting in casting curses on people.
pokedexEntries.white2: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a Gengar delighting in casting curses on people.
pokedexEntries.x: It hides in shadows. It is said that if Gengar is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedexEntries.y: Hiding in people's shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.
pokedexEntries.omegaRuby: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
pokedexEntries.alphaSapphire: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
pokedexEntries.sun: Should you feel yourself attacked by a sudden chill, it is evidence of an approaching Gengar. There is no escaping it. Give up.
pokedexEntries.moon: It apparently wishes for a traveling companion. Since it was once human itself, it tries to create one by taking the lives of other humans.
pokedexEntries.ultraSun: You can hear tales told all over the world about how Gengar will pay a visit to children who are naughty.
pokedexEntries.ultraMoon: Even your home isn’t safe. Gengar will lurk in whatever dark corner of a room it can find and wait for its chance to catch its prey.
